title: [Influences of dihydromyricetin on proliferation and apoptosis of chondrocytes in osteoarthritis induced by H2O2 through ROS/p38-MAPK signal pathway].
abstract: To analyze the influences of dihydromyricetin on the proliferation and apoptosis of chondrocytes in osteoarthritis induced by hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) through reactive oxygen species (ROS)/p38 mitogen activated protein kinase (p38-MAPK) pathway.
journal: Zhongguo gu shang = China journal of orthopaedics and traumatology
